content: Thanks for writing about FixMyStreet. I like the visualisation and I hope it stimulates further discussion and engagement. I’m curious about “The other possibility is that the council wasn’t on the FixMyStreet site at all” — please let me know if you know of councils not listed. The base layer for the territorial authorities on FixMyStreet is http://koordinates.com/layer/4241-nz-territorial-authorities-2012-yearly-pattern/
